## Synopsis
In this report we aim to describe which type of US weather events are most harmful with respect to population health and which have the greatest economic consequences.

---

## Data Processing

### Reading in the data
We first read in the data from the csv file in [Storm Data](https://d396qusza40orc.cloudfront.net/repdata%2Fdata%2FStormData.csv.bz2) 47mb bz2 file specified in the assignment. 
```{r}
storms <- read.csv("data/repdata-data-StormData.csv", stringsAsFactors=FALSE)
```
After reading in the data we check the first few rows (902297) in this dataset.
```{r}
dim(storms)
```
```{r}
head(storms)
```
There are 985 different event types `EVTYPE`.
```{r}
unique(storms$EVTYPE)
```
